title: Ambler boy, 8, dies after being accidentally shot by another child
content:
An 8-year-old boy in Ambler was accidentally shot and killed by another child while they were playing with a firearm on Saturday, Alaska State Troopers said.
Troopers first received a report at 11 p.m. Saturday of an accidental shooting in Ambler, a community of about 250 people on the Kobuk River in the Northwest Arctic region.
"An investigation showed that C.G., 8, of Ambler, was playing with his cousins in the yard of their residence," troopers wrote in an online dispatch. "While playing in a nearby shed, the children obtained a loaded firearm from the rafters."
